title: Johnny Mercer – 2022 Comments on the Resignation of Liz Truss
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Johnny Mercer, the Conservative MP for Plymouth Moor View, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content:
On one level I’m relived. On another this is a deeply personal human tragedy that is awful to watch. Liz isn’t a bad person – quite the reverse.
